title: Correct a Misleading Viral Rumor
description: A false rumor about a public figure is spreading rapidly on social media. A journalist must quickly publish a story to debunk it.

tasks.description: Gather evidence that definitively proves the rumor is false (e.g., official statements, documents, primary source confirmation).
Write a clear, concise article with a direct headline like 'No, [Public Figure] Did Not Do [False Claim]'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A direct and unambiguous debunking article is written.

tasks.description: Share the article widely on all social media platforms, especially in replies to influential accounts that are spreading the misinformation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correction is proactively distributed to counter the rumor's spread.
